[[Image:Wendish Town Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Wendish Town on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Wendish Town''' is a town in [[the Riverlands]], the region controlled by [[House Tully]] of [[Riverrun]]. It is located north of Riverrun, near the Blue Fork of [[the Trident]] and south of [[Seagard]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/raventree-hall/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Raventree Hall entry]</ref>
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Wendish Town is sacked at the outset of the [[War of the Five Kings]]. [[House Lannister|Lannister]] raiders slip across the border and attack the town. The inhabitants retreat to the holdfast, but the raiders burn it. As the townsfolk flee, they are shot down with arrows.

The town is noted as the home of the popular song ''On a Misty Morn'', one of the songs in the repertoire of the bard [[Marillion]].
